title: res领地插件
author: 神坑小弦
txt_content: 为什么op也不能破坏别人领地的箱子，能调的吗

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
给予OP residence.bypass.build和residence.bypass.destroy权限试试
(GroupManager)
/manaddp 某个人 residence.bypass.build
/manaddp 某个人 residence.bypass.destroy
(LuckPerms)
/lp user 某人 permission set residence.bypass.build true
/lp user 某人 permission set residence.bypass.destory true
如果还是不行,建议直接给予residence.*权限
